YEAR 6 QUESTIONNAIRE FOR THE CLASS TEACHER
This questionnaire is for the Year 6 class teacher.
It asks about the physical environment of the classroom, the class structure, the school ethos and the stresses
and strains you may be feeling.
We would be grateful if you could answer all questions, but if there are any you feel are inappropriate please

Sequence › alspac_02_qct › SECTION D: STRESSES AND STRAINS
Often teachers nowadays are under considerable stress. The following questions will enable us to assess your
well-being, and have been used in many studies.
